Author: DarkGoddess
Title: DROPANSWER
Body: Do you make use of an escrow service, and if so can they confirm they will hold funds and also do refunds if your target is not achieved?

Author: chriswhiner
Title: DROPANSWER
Body: We do not need any escrow because it is written in our smart contract if minimum funding target is not reach contract will refund all the money back to investors.

Author: chriswhiner
Title: DROPANSWER
Body: yes we have many plans in future.We have clear stated everything in whitepaper.I am sure this will be successful because it is win win situation for both content writer and other content repliers to make incentive while providing quality content.Successful example of these types of programs is Steemit.

Author: jc12345
Title: DROPANSWER
Body: You mention a debit card from which you can withdraw. Are you referring to fiat withdrawals? How do you foresee this working?

Author: chriswhiner
Title: DROPANSWER
Body: We are referring to withdrawal of DeeCOIN. In future we offer Visa or Master card to our platform users.They will be able to instantly transfer their DeeCOIN funds they have on our platform DROPANSWER. When you withdraw your funds from card only then they will be converted to fiat according to the exchange rate at that time.

Author: Cboy
Title: DROPANSWER
Body: Is there any referral commission i saw your website it says 5% referral commission.Please explain how it works

Author: chriswhiner
Title: DROPANSWER
Body: Referral system is placed to appreciate promoters to promote our ICO.You will earn 5% of your referred member purchase.To participate in our referral rewards you need to register account on our website.After logging in go to referral rewards page and share your unique code image on twitter and facebook with your friends.You can work in both bounty campaign and referral campaign at the same time.Our image is optimized for facebook twitter and other social media websites.I hope you understand it now.Let me know if you need further help
